txt.en: Marigold Twospade has asked you to bring her some minor tailoring-lore so she can learn the trade.

'I'm trying to learn how to sew and knit and make clothing out of leather and cloth and fabric, but no one is willing to teach me! It's so very maddening!

'If you happen to obtain any minor tailoring-lore, could you give it to me? If no one will teach me, how am I supposed to learn?

'I found a few old tablets in the South Fields that I'd be willing to give you if you helped me out, and maybe I could find one or two other useful things as well!'
Marigold Twospade is in Michel Delving.\n\nMarigold asked you to bring her some minor tailoring-lore so she can get a start on learning the trade, even though no one will teach her.

'This will be just the thing, [placeholder]! I'll study this and become the best tailor in all the Shire -- you just wait and see!\n\n'I've been saving up to buy something like this, so I'll give the coins to you instead, and these other things!'
Marigold Twospade is in Michel Delving.\n\nMarigold asked you to bring her some minor tailoring-lore so she can get a start on learning the trade, even though no one will teach her.
'Without some minor tailoring-lore, I'll never learn how to become a seamstress!'
Bring minor tailoring-lore to Marigold Twospade
